00055         Scrollbar::Scrollbar(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, UI::ScrollbarStyle Style, UILayer* parent)
00056             : Widget(name, parent),
00057               UpLeftButton(NULL),
00058               DownRightButton(NULL),
00059               ScrollerValue(0),
00060               IncrementDistance(0.1),
00061               ScrollerLock(true),
00062               ScrollBackLock(true),
00063               UpLeftLock(true),
00064               DownRightLock(true)
00065         {
00066             RelPosition = Position;
00067             RelSize = Size;
00068             Type = Widget::Scrollbar;
00069             ScrollStyle = Style;
00070             if(Size.Y > Size.X * 2)
00071             {
00072                 Vector2 ASize = Size * Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00073                 CalculateOffsets(ASize);
00074                 CreateVerticalScrollbar(Position, Size);
00075             }
00076             else if(Size.X > Size.Y * 2)
00077             {
00078                 Vector2 ASize = Size * Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00079                 CalculateOffsets(ASize);
00080                 CreateHorizontalScrollbar(Position, Size);
00081             }
00082             else
00083             {
00084                 //World::GetWorldPointer()->LogAndThrow("Scrollbar dimensions incompatible with this widget.");
00085             }
00086         }
00087 
00088         Scrollbar::~Scrollbar()
00089         {
00090             delete Scroller;
00091             delete ScrollBack;
00092             delete UpLeftButton;
00093             delete DownRightButton;
00094         }
00095 
00096         void Scrollbar::CreateHorizontalScrollbar(const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size)
00097         {
00098             Horizontal = true;
00099             //Get the size for all items involved
00100             Vector2 ScrollBackSize, LeftButtonSize, RightButtonSize;
00101             if(UI::SB_NoButtons==ScrollStyle)
00102             {
00103                 ScrollBackSize = Size;
00104             }else{
00105                 ScrollBackSize.X = Size.X - (Size.Y * 2);
00106                 ScrollBackSize.Y = Size.Y;
00107                 LeftButtonSize.X = Size.Y;
00108                 LeftButtonSize.Y = Size.Y;
00109                 RightButtonSize.X = Size.Y;
00110                 RightButtonSize.Y = Size.Y;
00111             }
00112             //Get the position for all items involved and configure their offsets
00113             Vector2 ScrollBackPosition, LeftButtonPosition, RightButtonPosition;
00114             if(UI::SB_Separate==ScrollStyle)
00115             {
00116                 ScrollBackPosition.X = Position.X + LeftButtonSize.X;
00117                 ScrollBackPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00118                 LeftButtonPosition = Position;
00119                 RightButtonPosition.X = Position.X + LeftButtonSize.X + ScrollBackSize.X;
00120                 RightButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00121             }
00122             else if(UI::SB_TogetherDownRight==ScrollStyle)
00123             {
00124                 ScrollBackPosition = Position;
00125                 LeftButtonPosition.X = Position.X + ScrollBackSize.X;
00126                 LeftButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00127                 RightButtonPosition.X = Position.X + ScrollBackSize.X + LeftButtonSize.X;
00128                 RightButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00129             }
00130             else if(UI::SB_TogetherUpLeft==ScrollStyle)
00131             {
00132                 ScrollBackPosition.X = Position.X + LeftButtonSize.X + RightButtonSize.X;
00133                 ScrollBackPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00134                 LeftButtonPosition = Position;
00135                 RightButtonPosition.X = Position.X + LeftButtonSize.X;
00136                 RightButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y;
00137             }
00138             else
00139             {
00140                 ScrollBackPosition = Position;
00141             }
00142             //Now create the objects, since we have all the position and size data we need
00143             ScrollBack = new Rectangle(ScrollBackPosition,ScrollBackSize,Parent);
00144             Scroller = new Button(Name+"SC",ScrollBackPosition,ScrollBackSize,Parent);
00145             if(LeftButtonSize.X > 0 && LeftButtonSize.Y > 0)
00146             {
00147                 UpLeftButton = new Button(Name+"LB",LeftButtonPosition,LeftButtonSize,Parent);
00148             }
00149             if(RightButtonSize.X > 0 && RightButtonSize.Y > 0)
00150             {
00151                 DownRightButton = new Button(Name+"RB",RightButtonPosition,RightButtonSize,Parent);
00152             }
00153             CalculateScrollLimits();
00154         }
00155 
00156         void Scrollbar::CreateVerticalScrollbar(const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size)
00157         {
00158             Horizontal = false;
00159             //Get the size for all items involved
00160             Vector2 ScrollBackSize, UpButtonSize, DownButtonSize;
00161             if(UI::SB_NoButtons==ScrollStyle)
00162             {
00163                 ScrollBackSize = Size;
00164             }else{
00165                 ScrollBackSize.X = Size.X;
00166                 ScrollBackSize.Y = Size.Y - (Size.X * 2);
00167                 UpButtonSize.X = Size.X;
00168                 UpButtonSize.Y = Size.X;
00169                 DownButtonSize.X = Size.X;
00170                 DownButtonSize.Y = Size.X;
00171             }
00172             //Get the position for all items involved and configure their offsets
00173             Vector2 ScrollBackPosition, UpButtonPosition, DownButtonPosition;
00174             if(UI::SB_Separate==ScrollStyle)
00175             {
00176                 ScrollBackPosition.X = Position.X;
00177                 ScrollBackPosition.Y = Position.Y + UpButtonSize.Y;
00178                 UpButtonPosition = Position;
00179                 DownButtonPosition.X = Position.X;
00180                 DownButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y + UpButtonSize.Y + ScrollBackSize.Y;
00181             }
00182             else if(UI::SB_TogetherDownRight==ScrollStyle)
00183             {
00184                 ScrollBackPosition = Position;
00185                 UpButtonPosition.X = Position.X;
00186                 UpButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y + ScrollBackSize.Y;
00187                 DownButtonPosition.X = Position.X;
00188                 DownButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y + ScrollBackSize.Y + UpButtonSize.Y;
00189             }
00190             else if(UI::SB_TogetherUpLeft==ScrollStyle)
00191             {
00192                 ScrollBackPosition.X = Position.X;
00193                 ScrollBackPosition.Y = Position.Y + UpButtonSize.Y + DownButtonSize.Y;
00194                 UpButtonPosition = Position;
00195                 DownButtonPosition.X = Position.X;
00196                 DownButtonPosition.Y = Position.Y + UpButtonSize.Y;
00197             }
00198             else
00199             {
00200                 ScrollBackPosition = Position;
00201             }
00202             //Now create the objects, since we have all the position and size data we need
00203             ScrollBack = new Rectangle(ScrollBackPosition,ScrollBackSize,Parent);
00204             Scroller = new Button(Name+"SC",ScrollBackPosition,ScrollBackSize,Parent);
00205             if(UpButtonSize.X > 0 && UpButtonSize.Y > 0)
00206             {
00207                 UpLeftButton = new Button(Name+"UB",UpButtonPosition,UpButtonSize,Parent);
00208             }
00209             if(DownButtonSize.X > 0 && DownButtonSize.Y > 0)
00210             {
00211                 DownRightButton = new Button(Name+"DB",DownButtonPosition,DownButtonSize,Parent);
00212             }
00213             CalculateScrollLimits();
00214         }
00215 
00216         bool Scrollbar::IsValidDimensions(const Vector2 &Size)
00217         {
00218             if(Size.X > Size.Y * 2)
00219             {
00220                 return true;
00221             }
00222             else if(Size.Y > Size.X * 2)
00223             {
00224                 return true;
00225             }
00226             return false;
00227         }
00228 
00229         void Scrollbar::SetHorizontal(const Vector2 &Size)
00230         {
00231             if(Size.X > Size.Y * 2)
00232             {
00233                 Horizontal = true;
00234             }
00235             else if(Size.Y > Size.X * 2)
00236             {
00237                 Horizontal = false;
00238             }
00239         }
00240 
00241         void Scrollbar::CalculateOffsets(const Vector2 &Size)
00242         {
00243             if(Horizontal)
00244             {
00245                 if(UI::SB_Separate==ScrollStyle)
00246                 {
00247                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(Size.Y,0);
00248                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00249                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2((Size.X - (Size.Y * 2)) + Size.Y,0);
00250                 }
00251                 else if(UI::SB_TogetherDownRight==ScrollStyle)
00252                 {
00253                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00254                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(Size.X - (Size.Y * 2),0);
00255                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2((Size.X - (Size.Y * 2)) + Size.Y,0);
00256                 }
00257                 else if(UI::SB_TogetherUpLeft==ScrollStyle)
00258                 {
00259                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(Size.Y * 2,0);
00260                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00261                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2(Size.Y,0);
00262                 }
00263             }else{
00264                 if(UI::SB_Separate==ScrollStyle)
00265                 {
00266                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(0,Size.X);
00267                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00268                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2(0,(Size.Y - (Size.X * 2)) + Size.X);
00269                 }
00270                 else if(UI::SB_TogetherDownRight==ScrollStyle)
00271                 {
00272                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00273                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,Size.Y - (Size.X * 2));
00274                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2(0,(Size.Y - (Size.X * 2)) + Size.X);
00275                 }
00276                 else if(UI::SB_TogetherUpLeft==ScrollStyle)
00277                 {
00278                     ScrollBackOffset = Vector2(0,Size.X * 2);
00279                     UpLeftButtonOffset = Vector2(0,0);
00280                     DownRightButtonOffset = Vector2(0,Size.X);
00281                 }
00282             }
00283         }
00284 
00285         void Scrollbar::CalculateScrollLimits()
00286         {
00287             if(Horizontal)
00288             {
00289                 ScrollerLowerLimit = ScrollBack->GetActualPosition().X;
00290                 ScrollerUpperLimit = ScrollBack->GetActualPosition().X + ScrollBack->GetActualSize().X;
00291             }else{
00292                 ScrollerLowerLimit = ScrollBack->GetActualPosition().Y;
00293                 ScrollerUpperLimit = ScrollBack->GetActualPosition().Y + ScrollBack->GetActualSize().Y;
00294             }
00295         }
00296 
00297         void Scrollbar::CalculateScrollValue()
00298         {
00299             Real Pos = 0;
00300             if(Horizontal)
00301             {
00302                 Pos = Scroller->GetActualPosition().X;
00303             }else{
00304                 Pos = Scroller->GetActualPosition().Y;
00305             }
00306             Real RelPos = Pos - ScrollerLowerLimit;
00307             Real RelLimit = ScrollerUpperLimit - ScrollerLowerLimit;
00308             ScrollerValue = RelPos / RelLimit;
00309         }
00310 
00311         void Scrollbar::SetToWithinLimits(Real &Coord)
00312         {
00313             Real SizeOffset = 0;
00314             if(Horizontal)
00315             {
00316                 SizeOffset = Scroller->GetActualSize().X;
00317             }else{
00318                 SizeOffset = Scroller->GetActualSize().Y;
00319             }
00320             if(Coord < ScrollerLowerLimit)
00321             {
00322                 Coord = ScrollerLowerLimit;
00323             }
00324             else if(Coord + SizeOffset > ScrollerUpperLimit)
00325             {
00326                 Coord = ScrollerUpperLimit - SizeOffset;
00327             }
00328         }
00329 
00330         void Scrollbar::SetLocation(const Vector2 &Position)
00331         {
00332             ScrollBack->SetActualPosition(Position + ScrollBackOffset);
00333             CalculateScrollLimits();
00334             Vector2 ScrollVal(0,0);
00335             if(Horizontal)
00336             {
00337                 ScrollVal.X = (ScrollerUpperLimit - ScrollerLowerLimit) * ScrollerValue;
00338             }else{
00339                 ScrollVal.Y = (ScrollerUpperLimit - ScrollerLowerLimit) * ScrollerValue;
00340             }
00341             Scroller->SetActualPosition(Position + ScrollBackOffset + ScrollVal);
00342             if(UpLeftButton)
00343             {
00344                 UpLeftButton->SetActualPosition(Position + UpLeftButtonOffset);
00345             }
00346             if(DownRightButton)
00347             {
00348                 DownRightButton->SetActualPosition(Position + DownRightButtonOffset);
00349             }
00350         }
00351 
00352         void Scrollbar::SetArea(const Vector2 &Size)
00353         {
00354             if(Horizontal)
00355             {
00356                 ScrollBack->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.X - (Size.Y * 2),Size.Y));
00357                 if(UpLeftButton)
00358                 {
00359                     UpLeftButton->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.Y,Size.Y));
00360                 }
00361                 if(DownRightButton)
00362                 {
00363                     DownRightButton->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.Y,Size.Y));
00364                 }
00365             }else{
00366                 ScrollBack->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.X,Size.Y - (Size.X * 2)));
00367                 if(UpLeftButton)
00368                 {
00369                     UpLeftButton->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.X,Size.X));
00370                 }
00371                 if(DownRightButton)
00372                 {
00373                     DownRightButton->SetActualSize(Vector2(Size.X,Size.X));
00374                 }
00375             }
00376             CalculateScrollLimits();
00377         }
00378 
00379         void Scrollbar::ButtonScroll(bool UpLeft)
00380         {
00381             if((!UpLeftLock && HoveredButton == UpLeftButton) || (!DownRightLock && HoveredButton == DownRightButton))
00382             {
00383                 Vector2 Loc = Scroller->GetActualPosition();
00384                 Real Scroll = ScrollBack->GetActualSize().X * IncrementDistance;
00385                 if(UpLeft)
00386                 {
00387                     Scroll = -Scroll;
00388                 }
00389                 if(Horizontal)
00390                 {
00391                     Loc.X+=Scroll;
00392                     SetToWithinLimits(Loc.X);
00393                 }else{
00394                     Loc.Y+=Scroll;
00395                     SetToWithinLimits(Loc.Y);
00396                 }
00397                 Scroller->SetActualPosition(Loc);
00398             }
00399         }
00400 
00401         void Scrollbar::MouseScroll(Vector2& Scroll)
00402         {
00403             if(!ScrollerLock)
00404             {
00405                 Vector2 Loc = Scroller->GetActualPosition();
00406                 if(Horizontal)
00407                 {
00408                     Scroll.Y = Loc.Y;
00409                     Scroll.X = Loc.X + Scroll.X;
00410                     SetToWithinLimits(Scroll.X);
00411                 }else{
00412                     Scroll.X = Loc.X;
00413                     Scroll.Y = Loc.Y + Scroll.Y;
00414                     SetToWithinLimits(Scroll.Y);
00415                 }
00416                 Scroller->SetActualPosition(Scroll);
00417             }
00418         }
00419 
00420         void Scrollbar::ScrollBackScroll()
00421         {
00422             if(!ScrollBackLock)
00423             {
00424                 Vector2 MousePos = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMouseCoordinates();
00425                 Vector2 ScPos = Scroller->GetActualPosition();
00426                 Vector2 ScSize = Scroller->GetActualSize();
00427                 if(Horizontal)
00428                 {
00429                     if(MousePos.X < ScPos.X)//left
00430                     {
00431                         ScPos.X = ScPos.X - ScSize.X <= ScrollerLowerLimit ? ScrollerLowerLimit : ScPos.X - ScSize.X ;
00432                         Scroller->SetActualPosition(ScPos);
00433                     }
00434                     else if(MousePos.X > ScPos.X + ScSize.X)//right
00435                     {
00436                         ScPos.X = ScPos.X + (ScSize.X * 2) >= ScrollerUpperLimit ? ScrollerUpperLimit - ScSize.X : ScPos.X + (ScSize.X * 2) ;
00437                         Scroller->SetActualPosition(ScPos);
00438                     }
00439                 }else{
00440                     if(MousePos.Y < ScPos.Y)//above
00441                     {
00442                         ScPos.Y = ScPos.Y - ScSize.Y <= ScrollerLowerLimit ? ScrollerLowerLimit : ScPos.Y - ScSize.Y ;
00443                         Scroller->SetActualPosition(ScPos);
00444                     }
00445                     else if(MousePos.Y > ScPos.Y + ScSize.Y)//below
00446                     {
00447                         ScPos.Y = ScPos.Y + (ScSize.Y * 2) >= ScrollerUpperLimit ? ScrollerUpperLimit - ScSize.Y : ScPos.Y + ScSize.Y ;
00448                         Scroller->SetActualPosition(ScPos);
00449                     }
00450                 }
00451             }
00452         }
00453 
00454         void Scrollbar::Update(bool Force)
00455         {
00456             MetaCode::ButtonState State = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMouseButtonState(1);
00457             if(HoveredButton)
00458             {
00459                 if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State || MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00460                 {
00461                     if(HoveredButton == Scroller)
00462                     {
00463                         if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00464                         {
00465                             ScrollerLock = false;
00466                         }
00467                         else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00468                         {
00469                             Vector2 Offset = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMousePrevFrameOffset();
00470                             MouseScroll(Offset);
00471                         }
00472                     }
00473                     else if(HoveredButton == UpLeftButton)
00474                     {
00475                         if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00476                         {
00477                             UpLeftLock = false;
00478                         }
00479                         else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00480                         {
00481                             ButtonScroll(true);
00482                         }
00483                     }
00484                     else if(HoveredButton == DownRightButton)
00485                     {
00486                         if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00487                         {
00488                             DownRightLock = false;
00489                         }
00490                         else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00491                         {
00492                             ButtonScroll(false);
00493                         }
00494                     }
00495                 }
00496             }
00497             else if(HoveredBack)
00498             {
00499                 if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00500                 {
00501                     ScrollBackLock = false;
00502                     ScrollBackScroll();
00503                 }
00504                 else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00505                 {
00506                     if(ScrollBackLock && !ScrollerLock)
00507                     {
00508                         Vector2 Offset = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMousePrevFrameOffset();
00509                         MouseScroll(Offset);
00510                     }else{
00511                         ScrollBackScroll();
00512                     }
00513                 }
00514             }
00515             else if(Force && MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00516             {
00517                 Vector2 Offset = Manager->GetInputQueryer()->GetMousePrevFrameOffset();
00518                 MouseScroll(Offset);
00519             }
00520             else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING == State)
00521             {
00522                 ScrollerLock = true;
00523                 ScrollBackLock = true;
00524                 UpLeftLock = true;
00525                 DownRightLock = true;
00526             }
00527             CalculateScrollValue();
00528         }
00529 
00530         void Scrollbar::SetVisible(bool visible)
00531         {
00532             ScrollBack->SetVisible(visible);
00533             Scroller->SetVisible(visible);
00534             if(UpLeftButton)
00535                 UpLeftButton->SetVisible(visible);
00536             if(DownRightButton)
00537                 DownRightButton->SetVisible(visible);
00538             Visible = visible;
00539         }
00540 
00541         bool Scrollbar::IsVisible()
00542         {
00543             return Visible;
00544         }
00545 
00546         void Scrollbar::Show()
00547         {
00548             ScrollBack->Show();
00549             Scroller->Show();
00550             if(UpLeftButton)
00551                 UpLeftButton->Show();
00552             if(DownRightButton)
00553                 DownRightButton->Show();
00554             Visible = true;
00555         }
00556 
00557         void Scrollbar::Hide()
00558         {
00559             ScrollBack->Hide();
00560             Scroller->Hide();
00561             if(UpLeftButton)
00562                 UpLeftButton->Hide();
00563             if(DownRightButton)
00564                 DownRightButton->Hide();
00565             Visible = false;
00566         }
00567 
00568         bool Scrollbar::CheckMouseHover()
00569         {
00570             if(!Visible)
00571                 return false;
00572             if(Scroller->CheckMouseHover())
00573             {
00574                 HoveredButton = Scroller;
00575                 HoveredBack = NULL;
00576                 //Update();
00577                 return true;
00578             }
00579             else if(UpLeftButton->CheckMouseHover())
00580             {
00581                 HoveredButton = UpLeftButton;
00582                 HoveredBack = NULL;
00583                 //Update();
00584                 return true;
00585             }
00586             else if(DownRightButton->CheckMouseHover())
00587             {
00588                 HoveredButton = DownRightButton;
00589                 HoveredBack = NULL;
00590                 //Update();
00591                 return true;
00592             }
00593             else if(ScrollBack->CheckMouseHover())
00594             {
00595                 HoveredButton = NULL;
00596                 HoveredBack = ScrollBack;
00597                 //Update();
00598                 return true;
00599             }
00600             //else
00601             //{
00602             //    HoveredButton = NULL;
00603             //    HoveredBack = NULL;
00604             //    Update();
00605             //    return false;
00606             //}
00607             HoveredButton = NULL;
00608             HoveredBack = NULL;
00609             return false;
00610         }
00611 
00612         Real Scrollbar::GetScrollerValue()
00613         {
00614             return ScrollerValue;
00615         }
00616 
00617         void Scrollbar::SetIncrementDistance(const Real IncDist)
00618         {
00619             IncrementDistance = IncDist;
00620         }
00621 
00622         void Scrollbar::SetScrollerSize(const Real Size)
00623         {
00624             if(Size > 1 || Size < 0)
00625                 return;
00626             Vector2 SB = ScrollBack->GetActualSize();
00627             Vector2 Sc = Scroller->GetActualSize();
00628             if(Horizontal)
00629             {
00630                 Vector2 NewSize(SB.X * Size,Sc.Y);
00631                 Scroller->SetActualSize(NewSize);
00632             }else{
00633                 Vector2 NewSize(Sc.X,SB.Y * Size);
00634                 Scroller->SetActualSize(NewSize);
00635             }
00636         }
00637 
00638         void Scrollbar::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00639         {
00640             RelPosition = Position;
00641             Vector2 Adjusted = Position * Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00642             SetLocation(Adjusted);
00643         }
00644 
00645         Vector2 Scrollbar::GetPosition()
00646         {
00647             return RelPosition;
00648         }
00649 
00650         void Scrollbar::SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00651         {
00652             RelPosition = Position / Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00653             SetLocation(Position);
00654         }
00655 
00656         Vector2 Scrollbar::GetActualPosition()
00657         {
00658             return (RelPosition * Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions());
00659         }
00660 
00661         void Scrollbar::SetSize(const Vector2 Size)
00662         {
00663             if(!IsValidDimensions(Size))
00664                 return;
00665             RelSize = Size;
00666             Vector2 Adjusted = Size * Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00667             SetHorizontal(Adjusted);
00668             if(ScrollStyle==SB_NoButtons)
00669             {
00670                 ScrollBack->SetActualSize(Adjusted);
00671             }else{
00672                 Vector2 Loc = RelPosition * Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00673                 CalculateOffsets(Adjusted);
00674                 SetArea(Adjusted);
00675                 SetLocation(Loc);
00676             }
00677         }
00678 
00679         Vector2 Scrollbar::GetSize()
00680         {
00681             return RelSize;
00682         }
00683 
00684         void Scrollbar::SetActualSize(const Vector2 Size)
00685         {
00686             if(!IsValidDimensions(Size))
00687                 return;
00688             RelSize = Size / Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00689             SetHorizontal(Size);
00690             if(ScrollStyle==SB_NoButtons)
00691             {
00692                 ScrollBack->SetActualSize(Size);
00693             }else{
00694                 Vector2 Loc = RelPosition * Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00695                 CalculateOffsets(Size);
00696                 SetArea(Size);
00697                 SetLocation(Loc);
00698             }
00699         }
00700 
00701         Vector2 Scrollbar::GetActualSize()
00702         {
00703             return (RelSize * Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions());
00704         }
00705 
00706         Button* Scrollbar::GetScroller()
00707         {
00708             return Scroller;
00709         }
00710

00712         {
00713             return UpLeftButton;
00714         }
00715 
00716         Button* Scrollbar::GetDownRightButton()
00717         {
00718             return DownRightButton;
00719         }

00722         {

00724         }
